blurb: On behalf of Gene Co Sensei and The Blessed for Service team, we thank you for your generous donation of any amount. Although not expected, it is always greatly appreciated and allows us to continue our work in service to humanity in honor of The One True God of all Compassion, Love, Light, and Creation, His one and only begotten Son, our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ and The Divine Holy Spirit.
check: You can send a check or money order in an envelope to the below address, please make it out to either Gene Decode or Blessed for Service. No Packages!
ko-fi: * Kofi donation (any amount, one-time or recurring payment) *
